meaningMnemonic: A <radical>leader</radical> with <radical>horns</radical> takes a <radical>lantern</radical> and searches for people to <kanji>join</kanji> him. He needs more people to join his cause so he can get his horns removed. He’s embarrassed of them which is why he only travels at night, hence the lantern.
readingMnemonic: The leader guy approaches you out of the darkness, his lantern held high. Oh no, not that guy. You've heard about his horn problem and you don't want to <kanji>join</kanji> him. You look around and spot a large <reading>hay</reading>stack (へい). You quickly jump into it and hide from him.
